snippet: The blaze, about 25 miles south of Albany at TCI of New York, was fueled by diesel, propane and mineral oil.
abstract: Large fire at a transformer recycling company in West Ghent, NY, prompts the evacuation of about 40 homes and a 'stay-indoors' advisory before it is brought under control; initial tests find no evidence of contamination.
lead_paragraph: The blaze, about 25 miles south of Albany at TCI of New York, was fueled by diesel, propane and mineral oil.

headline.seo: Industrial Fire in Columbia County Is Brought Under Control
headline.main: Big Industrial Fire Upstate Prompts Evacuations and Warnings
headline.print_headline: Big Industrial Fire Prompts Evacuation and Warning
